ðŸ“– Summary: The CSM repository provides a conversational speech generation model capable of generating realistic audio from text and audio inputs. It utilizes a Llama backbone and a smaller audio decoder to produce RVQ audio codes, enabling the creation of diverse voices and contextual speech. The model can be fine-tuned for specific voices and supports prompting and context using audio segments.
